======
hklpy2
======

.. include:: /substitutions.txt

.. index:: !hklpy

|hklpy2| - the 2nd generation Python package for practical use of diffractometers with the
`Bluesky Framework <https://blueskyproject.io>`_.

.. caution:: Development in progress.
